title: 'Makes medicine-taking simpler'
body: 'The boxes come within a box; so they‚Äôre secure. The plastic may not be world-class but it‚Äôs sturdy and looks like it will last a while.  Each day is separate so when travelling it‚Äôs easier to take the medication for the days traveled instead of the whole box.  Each day has four compartments- medicines can be arranged according to requirement.  The individual boxes can fit about five big pills.  This box has really streamlined the process for me and I found it very useful.'

title: 'Absolutely Misleading Product Images!'
body: I was genuinely excited to receive this product, only to be utterly disappointed when I opened the package. The item inside bore little to no resemblance to the images displayed on the product's Amazon page. All the photos are grossly misleading, painting a picture of a product that you will simply not receive at the time of delivery. It's alarming that such deceptive practices are present on a platform as reputable as Amazon. This discrepancy needs to be reported to Amazon immediately to prevent other unsuspecting customers from being duped. I strongly advise against buying this product. Save your money and time.

title: 'Good product
body: '4.0 out of 5 stars''Good product easy to open and easy to carry the block for 1 day.  But if someone is taking medicines at odd times (say before breakfast and after breakfast or say empty stomach) sorting those becomes difficult. The pillbox does have one backup slot but maybe two backup slots should be provided.'

title: 'Good Product with real practical use'
body: 'I have to take medicine three time a day. I buy 3 months medicine one time. Its looks odd to carry whole bunch of medicine to office and take in front of colleagues and sounds packing material makes. This product is solution its takes 5 minutes to fill the box for whole week. You can carry single day box or complete box. Just open box and take dose. Its also easy to monitor missed dose.'

title: 'Those who have a requirement to regularly take medication this is the best option'
body: I need to be taking medication every day and usually forget many a times. This has made it easy for me and my family to track if I have taken the medication. You don't have to open and check, It is transparent and you can see the medicine inside each day and morning, afternoon and Night. It also has extra option for if you have to take another medicine in between too. It has made my life easy. The product is elegant, sturdy. It is also easy to organize. It is a great travel mate.
